Headline: #59 59th/61stTemporary Reroute near State/60th
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses rrtd EB via 59th, Michigan, 61st  & over normal route; WB via 61st, Indiana, 59th & over normal route due to police activity near State/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/60th due to police activity. 

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 59th, Michigan, 61st, then resume their normal route.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 61st, Indiana, 59th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/delays after an earlier mechanical problem at Western (O'Hare Branch). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Western (O'Hare Branch).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
